data.title: Recognition
data.text:
The Anchoring the Future campaign for Delta Gamma received the support of thousands of sisters and friends. All Foundation gifts received July 1, 2018, to June 30, 2024, are included in the overall campaign total. Each and every gift is appreciated and has propelled the momentum of the campaign towards its inspirational $50 Million goal and ensures that Delta Gamma remains a strong sisterhood for years to come. Thank you to all donors for your generous support.

The Campaign includes:

Delta Gamma Foundation’s annual giving society, the Rose Circle Society, recognizes members who give a total of $1,000 or more to the Delta Gamma Foundation during one fiscal year, July 1-June 30. Donations to all funds qualify and membership is eligible for renewal each year.

Delta Gamma Foundation’s lifetime giving totals are the sum of gifts to all funds to the Delta Gamma Foundation recognizing members for their individual gifts.

The Founders Legacy Society, the Delta Gamma Foundation’s planned giving society, recognizes members leaving the Foundation in their will or estate plans or that make a qualifying gift during their lifetime.

Learn more Founders Legacy Society Members
